translation: The Blessed Lord said, "Renunciation and the Yoga of action both lead to the highest bliss; but of the two, the Yoga of action is superior to the renunciation of action."
commentary: 5.2 Renunciation renunciation? Karma Yoga: Yoga of action? f and? Nishreyasakarau leading to the highest bliss? Ubhau both? of these two? You but? karmasannyasat than renunciation of action? Karma Yoga: Yoga of action? Vishishyate is superior.Commentary Sannyasa (renunciation of action) and Karma Yoga (performance of action) both lead to Moksha or liberation or the highest bliss. Though both lead to Moksha? Yet
